serviceTypes.subtitle: A permanent solution for missing teeth.

content.title: Introduction
content.paragraph: Dental implants are a long-term solution to replace missing teeth.

content.title: Procedure
content.paragraph: The implant involves placing a titanium post into the jawbone.

content.title: Durability
content.paragraph: Dental implants can last a lifetime with proper care.

content.title: Natural Appearance
content.paragraph: They provide a natural look and function like real teeth.

faq.question: How long do dental implants last?
faq.answer: With proper care, dental implants can last a lifetime.

faq.question: Is the implant procedure painful?
faq.answer: The procedure is done under local anesthesia, and discomfort is minimal.

serviceTypes.subtitle: A metal-free alternative to traditional implants.

content.title: Introduction to Zirconium
content.paragraph: Zirconium implants are ideal for patients with metal allergies.

faq.question: Are Zirconium Implants safe?
faq.answer: Yes, they are biocompatible and hypoallergenic.

serviceTypes.subtitle: A safe and effective way to reduce fine lines.

content.title: How it works
content.paragraph: Botox temporarily relaxes muscles to smooth out wrinkles.

faq.question: How long does Botox last?
faq.answer: Botox effects last 3 to 4 months on average.
